analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x4c2085edeefa307e73a10e3e7224886e6b6a0586.sol:
	Contract BREDToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x4c2085edeefa307e73a10e3e7224886e6b6a0586.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/38/0x4c2085edeefa307e73a10e3e7224886e6b6a0586.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
